comment.body:
> [erkan](#comment_2_1H8oKiRa7fGgUqS1hpUtaSYLvAqkaknbkf): I use evil google for that :-( Do you know a better one ?

No one is better than Google...

> [erkan](#comment_2_1H8oKiRa7fGgUqS1hpUtaSYLvAqkaknbkf): I use evil google for that :-( Do you know a better one ?

Maybe some day we will have ZeroNet  Translate :D

> [imawho](#comment_11_16dAKXJdQKVKinMALLsL4YkdAkSDQiPAiw): hahah but it's hard for me to imagine writing a translation program using jsor maybe you mean human-powered decentralized online translation? (lol)

Yes, Human Powered for P2P. Everyone can do a little for that ;)

> [erkan](#comment_3_1H8oKiRa7fGgUqS1hpUtaSYLvAqkaknbkf): +1
> 
> indeed

ZeroNet Realtime Update is so good. I can see information fast in NewsFeed ; )
If I can click someone id in NewsFeed, and then linking to the user's comment of post, that will be petty cool!

> [imawho](#comment_12_16dAKXJdQKVKinMALLsL4YkdAkSDQiPAiw): that's nice, i'm looking forward to contributing to such a translation site...

Google provide [this](https://translate.google.com/community) for contributing, but everyone data is stored in Google, and then they use data for earning money...

> [imawho](#comment_13_16dAKXJdQKVKinMALLsL4YkdAkSDQiPAiw): 好快= =

我是沙發魔人XD

> [imawho](#comment_14_16dAKXJdQKVKinMALLsL4YkdAkSDQiPAiw): 话说你看到的在我这里评论区的容量限额是多少？

目前是200K。我已經用3K了

> [imawho](#comment_15_16dAKXJdQKVKinMALLsL4YkdAkSDQiPAiw): 好，那说明我改成功了默认的10k真蛋疼 我都5.5了

10K太小了，沒多久會爆掉

> [imawho](#comment_16_16dAKXJdQKVKinMALLsL4YkdAkSDQiPAiw): 丧心病狂，没发完的文章都不放过

XD 緊迫盯人兵法
